taglines.content: Empowering business professionals to advance their careers by bringing the practitioner’s perspective to business education

entry_points.title: Leadership Channel:
entry_points.subtitle: Distinguished Alumni Lecture Series:
entry_points.content: McKinsey Academy participants have access to leadership insights from distinguished McKinsey alumni as well as other global CEOs.

entry_points.title: ABOUT McKINSEY ACADEMY:
entry_points.subtitle: Academic Advisory Council
entry_points.content: The Advisory Council will shape the research agenda for McKinsey Academy, offer perspectives on successful and emerging pedagogical methods, and suggest ideas for future experimentation.

entry_points.title: Mckinsey academy:
entry_points.subtitle: We provide an immersive experience for our learners:
entry_points.content: Curated and discoverable content Intuitive navigation through courses and lessons Tools for social interaction within cohorts Data visualizations of progress

entry_points.title: OUR PROGRAM OFFERING:
entry_points.subtitle: Introducing the McKinsey Management Program:
entry_points.content: Launching Summer 2014 to build business capabilities for rising professionals, functional experts, and entrepreneurs.

entry_points.title: ABOUT McKINSEY ACADEMY:
entry_points.subtitle: McKinsey Academy is a premium digital platform for business education.
entry_points.content: We empower leaders and professionals to build the skills and capabilities to enhance individual effectiveness for improved corporate performance.

entry_points.title: OUR PEDAGOGY:
entry_points.subtitle: McKinsey Academy Pedagogy is based on four core principles:
entry_points.content: Learning by doing Focus on expert performance Deep feedback Social Learning

features.title: Practitioner's perspective
features.content: Courses leverage practical, real-world experiences, ensuring relevant capability building for each individual.

features.title: Social learning with multi-industry teams
features.content: Collaborate with your peers across industries and geographies on group based projects and in community discussion forums.

features.title: Deep feedback
features.content: Immediate, response-contingent feedback enables richer learning.

features.title: McKinsey TA guidance
features.content: McKinsey consultants serve as teaching assistants, providing for distinctive engagement and guidance of each cohort.

features.title: ADAPTIVE LEARNING MECHANICS
features.content: Rich learning experience incorporates ground-breaking techniques in adaptive learning and game mechanics.

features.title: Curated programs
features.content: Courses are created, convened and curated to meaningfully advance business capabilities of McKinsey Academy's target audience.

quotes.quote: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily; even if you had no title or position.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: The key to successful leadership today is influence, not authority.
quotes.name: Kenneth Blanchard
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
quotes.name: General Dwight Eisenhower
quotes.title: 34th President of the United States

quotes.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy
quotes.title: 35th President of the United States

quotes.quote: You don’t lead by pointing and telling people some place to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.
quotes.name: Ken Kesey
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: A great leader’s courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
quotes.name: John Maxwell
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.name: John Quincy Adams
quotes.title: 6th President of the United States
